project0.title: AETHER
project0.about: Aether is a science fiction graphic novel I am currently writing.

project1.title: GAUNTLET
project1.about: Based on the 1985 game of the same name, Gauntlet is a team project that I led at the Carnegie Mellon University Summer Program in 2018. The player's goal is to progress through the various dungeon levels, fight monsters, and collect items. It can be played with up to two players; one controlling the wizard and one controlling the warrior.

project2.title: MAGE MATCH
project2.about: You play as a wizard attempting to piece together a powerful spell. To build your masterpiece, you must match elemental components with each other to increase your magical output. Work quickly and keep your options open- if you make too many mistakes, your smell might fizzle out!

project4.title: SLIME JUMP
project4.about: This game is similar to Doodle Jump. The player's goal is to beat his/her high score by jumping on the platforms as long as possible. If the player falls, he/she loses.
